title: >-
  White House defends Trump calling female reporter ‘piggy’ - The Washington
  Post
---
<p>The president has escalated his attacks on the media amid political blowback for his handling of files related to deceased sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.</p>
<p>White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt on Thursday defended President Donald Trump’s decision to call a female reporter “Piggy” on Air Force One, claiming the insult reflected the “frankness” that helped him win a second term.</p>
